content.body:
Alternate Language profiles allow you to store and manage entity information in a variety of different languages, as well as publish this content to your Pages.





Note: In order to add an Alternate Language Profile, this feature must be turned on in your account. To have this enabled, reach out to your Client Success Manager or contact Yext Support.





To add an Alternate Language Profile:





1. Click **Knowledge Graph** in the navigation bar and click **Entities**.
2. Click on the entity you would like to edit.



   * To edit multiple entities at once, visit the [Edit Entities in Bulk](https://help.yext.com/hc/en\-us/articles/4404675809819) article.




3. Click on the **+ Add Language** link in the right sidebar. A dialog box appears.
4. Click **Choose Language** and select the desired language.
5. Click **Add**.




   * You will see the new language added under the **Alternate** section in the sidebar.





To edit a language profile for an entity or set of entities, click on the corresponding language in the sidebar. The language you are editing will be bolded with a grey background. When a language is selected, all edits you make will only apply to that language profile.





![mceclip0.png](https://help.yext.com/hc/article_attachments/8223168350875/mceclip0.png)
